attributes.action: Call an election to decide on a new prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown is not this countries choice of prime minister and was not elected into that office.
His leadership is likely to prove detrimental to this country and it's citizens and we should be allowed the right to chose who fills this important position.
Parliament should be dissolved and the country should have the right to express their opinions regardless the effect on the present government.
I did not vote labour in the last election, never the less I accepted the democratic decision. Now Mr. Blair has decided to stand down the option to elect someone else should be given back to the voters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
